result_index.description: index of the output to use to compute the score

objective_function.description: objective function to use as the score

limit.description: Limit the parameter values inside the min - max range

sigma.description: standard deviation of the normal distribution used to generate the initial points

ranges.description: list of 2-tuples, one for each function parameter, to use as range for the initial points

no_improve_thr.description: break after max_stagnations iterations with an improvement lower than no_improv_thr

max_stagnations.description: break after max_stagnations iterations with an improvement lower than no_improv_thr

save_results.description: Save resulting parameter set into json file at this path
